mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TABLE_QNA_REPLY (reQnaNo, qnaNo, docNo, reQnaContent) VALUES (SEQ_QNA_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{qnaNo}, #{docNo}, #{reQnaContent})
mapper.select: SELECT REQNANO,DOCNO,QNANO,DOCNAME, DOCMAJOR, DOCADDRESS, REQNACONTENT, REQNADATE, FILENAME,UUID,UPLOADPATH,QNATITLE FROM ( SELECT r.reQnaNO, r.DOCNO, r.QNANO, DOCNAME, DOCMAJOR, DOCADDRESS, REQNACONTENT, REQNADATE, a.FILENAME,a.UUID,a.UPLOADPATH ,q.QNATITLE FROM TABLE_DOC d, TABLE_QNA_REPLY r,TABLE_DOC_ATTACH a, TABLE_QNA q WHERE r.DOCNO = d.DOCNO AND r.DOCNO=a.DOCNO AND r.QNANO=q.QNANO ORDER BY r.QNANO desc ) WHERE QNANO = #{qnaNo}
